# kVTUnlimitedFrameDelayCount

**Global Variable**

Indicates that no limit should be set on the compression window.

## Declaration

```swift
var kVTUnlimitedFrameDelayCount: Int { get }
```
title: kVTUnlimitedFrameDelayCount
